class.name: ASAuthorizationAppleIDCredential
class.brief_description: Represents a credential that results from a successful Apple ID authentication.
class.description:
This class contains information about the user authenticated via Sign in with Apple. It includes the user identifier, full name, email, and authentication tokens.
The [member identity_token] and [member authorization_code] properties are provided as [PackedByteArray]s, which can be sent to your backend server for verification.
The [member real_user_status] property can help you determine if the user is likely a real person or a bot.

members.member: The user's email address. may be a proxy address if the user chose to hide their email.
An arbitrary string that your app provided to the request that generated this credential.
An identifier associated with the authenticated user. This identifier is stable and unique to your team.
